content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Funerals are allowed but only 10 people can be present. The general obligations to wear a mask follow hygienic regulations apply. As part of preventative measures, keep the distance between yourself and others (even when sitting).

questions_answers.question: Is it possible to have live music at the funeral?
Can the elderly attend funerals?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but given the high risks of infection in at-risk groups, it is good to take it into consideration.

questions_answers.question: Do I have to wear a face mask during the mourning ceremony?
Can I go to the cemetery?
questions_answers.value: Yes, travel to and from the cemetery is exempt from the free movement of persons. But do not gather with other people and wear a face mask when in the cemetery.
